Posts.Content: Hi I have a white spot on my nipple it does hurt and aches like any other sort of spot, I am 43 I am single mum but my son is 11 did think blocked milk duct but would I get one as my son 11, and would it hurt and ache? I don’t see my gp till next week as I have prolapse discs and degenerated disc disease so take lots of pain killers and not helping with the pain and going to be worrying about it till next week
Posts.Title: Worried about white speck on nipple
